When recording the spectrum in Fig. 3a, some stray light of the UV pump laser passed the spectrometer off-axis. Therefore, we started integration 20 ns after the maximum of the pump pulse to ensure that also the electrical response of the photomultiplier had concluded. In contrast, the strong, and therefore short-lived, blue fluorescence shown in Fig. 3b, c was integrated over the complete pulse.
